price: 14. les gens de Al-Aykah aussi, et le peuple de Tubba’, tous osèrent démentir les Messagers. Ainsi Ma Menace put-elle se justifier.
arabic: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṣḥābu al-aykati waqawmu tubbaʿin kullun kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa waʿīdi
